basics.name: Bjørn Hoxmark
basics.label: Data Scientist
basics.summary: I'm a curious Data Scientist currently working with machine learning and recommender systems at FINN.no, focusing on leveraging NLP in our job matching engine. My background includes software development and a MSc from NTNU. I have a strong passion for Computers and Technology and continually seek to learn new things.

work.name: FINN.no - mulighetenes marked
work.summary: Working with recommender systems, with a focus on the job vertical, leveraging machine learning and NLP.

work.name: FINN.no - mulighetenes marked
work.summary: Redesigned and rewrote the admin page for an ad on Finn using NodeJS and React, and implemented a new feedback feature using Spring Boot.

work.name: Nordic Semiconductor ASA
work.summary: Developed a tool for developers working with low energy Bluetooth mesh-enabled projects, using technologies like React, Redux, and Electron.

work.name: Norsk energiteknikk
work.summary: Provided technical support for various systems, gaining insights into new product introduction and support strategies.
